attributes.comment:
Why are we punishing people for going through a legal process to become a legal
citizen by tripling, in some cases, the application fee?
How can the implementation of this proposed fee structure be justified making
legal immigration, in some cases, cost prohibitive?
I think this proposed fee structure is outrageous and speaks poorly for a country
that is struggling with a large illegal immigration problem. A country that largely
looks the other way on an estimated 14 million illegal immigrants, but wants to
place this financially hardship on people for legally immigrating here.
I am planning to contact my senator and congressman and let him know how I
feel.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Consuelo M. Schwartz
